game.name: Sanxingdui Wonders
game.genres: 어드벤처, 캐주얼, 인디, RPG, 시뮬레이션, 전략
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 캡션 이용 가능, 마우스 전용 옵션, 수시 저장, 자막 옵션, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: An Amazing Night in Sanxingdui​​ is a Guofeng anime-style puzzle-adventure game immersing players in ancient Shu culture.
game.shortDescriptionEn: An Amazing Night in Sanxingdui​​ is a Guofeng anime-style puzzle-adventure game immersing players in ancient Shu culture.
